short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Curate & Collect: Share content on your Facebook, Twitter & LinkedIn profiles or save & collect the links in your Blog2Social WebApp

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Click on the Blog2Social button in your browser to directly share or collect content you stumbled upon while browsing.

Use the Extension for:
•Customized Auto-Posting: Connect and post to your profiles on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with just one click. Tailor your posts and add comments, tags, hashtags, handles, or emojis for each social network.
•Content Curation: Have you stumbled upon an exciting article you would like to share with your followers? Click on the Blog2Social button and share content the moment you discover it.
•Collecting Content: You don’t have time to share a post right now? Save any post or link as a draft to your WordPress blog or your Blog2Social WebApp account.
long.de:
By clicking on the Blog2Social button, you can share any link, image or video you want to post on Twitter, Facebook and LinkedIn.

Connect the Blog2Social browser extension to your Blog2Social App account and share automatically on Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, Google+, Pinterest, LinkedIn, Flickr, Tumblr, Torial, Medium, VK, Bloglovin', XING, Reddit, Diigo, and Google My Business.

TOP 3 Features
•Auto-Posting: Share your posts with just one click on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn
•Content Curation: Have you stumbled upon an exciting article you would like to share with your followers? Click on the Blog2Social button and share content the moment you discover it.
•Save articles and share them later: You don’t have time to share a post right now? Save any post or link as a draft to your Blog2Social App account and you can share or schedule it later on up to 16 social media networks.

Overview
Blog2Social is available as social media automation solution for WordPress, as App and as browser extension. 
Blog2Social Free is free forever. If you want to use all awesome features for sharing and scheduling upgrade to Blog2Social Premium.    
You can upgrade to one of the premium licenses at any time for additional social media connections and even more features to automate, share, schedule, and customize your social media content.
You can use the browser extension as a stand-alone tool for auto posting on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn. Or you can connect the extension to your Blog2Social App account with just one click and automatically share your posts on up to 16 networks.

Browser-Extension Free-Version:
•Connect profiles on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn.
•Share your posts across all your selected networks.
•Tailor your posts and add comments, tags, hashtags, handles, or emoji’s for each social network.
•Content Curation: Share any link, picture, or video. 

Browser-Extension Free-Version with the Blog2Social App:
•Connect profiles on Facebook, Twitter, VK.com, Google+, LinkedIn, Instagram, XING, Reddit, Pinterest, Flickr, Medium, Tumblr, Torial, Diigo, and Bloglovin.
•Connect your business page on Facebook
•Content Curation: Share any link, picture, or video. 
•Share your posts across all your selected networks
•Use Facebook Instant Sharing to share your posts on Facebook Profiles, Pages, in Groups, and Events!
•Tailor your posts and add comments, tags, hashtags, handles, or emoji’s for each social network.
•Manage all posts and share posts of all users (administrator rights required)
•Select and share images with your posts
•Keep track of your social media posts with the posting dashboard

Browser-Extension Premium with the Blog2Social App:
Blog2Social Premium includes all features of the free version and awesome additional features including:
•Connect pages and groups on Facebook, VK.com, Google+ and XING as well as pages on LinkedIn.
•Connect multiple social channels per network 
•Connect your Google My Business account to Blog2Social to share your posts on your Google My Business listing.
•Social Media Auto-Format: Blog2Social automatically turns your post into an adapted format for each social media network, appropriate character counts and image sizes, and hashtags from your post tags.
•Best Time Scheduler: ready-to-use time scheme for scheduling, or custom time settings to schedule your posts once, multiple times or recurrently for up to one year.
•Schedule your posts on network level to share them automatically on your profiles, pages, and groups at the best times to post on each network.
•Select any image you want to share with your post for any social media post and network.
•Select link post or image post/photo post format for Facebook, Google+, and Twitter.
•Schedule multiple individually tailored posts in one easy step in your one-page preview editor
•Social Media Calendar: edit or change scheduled posts per drag & drop, keep track of your scheduling plan, filter per network and user.
•Define multiple combinations of network profiles, pages, and groups for specific sharing purposes.
•Reporting View all shared and scheduled social media posts, follow the links     on your dashboard to view the shared posts on your social media timelines, and keep track of your scheduled posts with the Social Media Calendar.
•Top up and activate multiple users.
•Top up and activate multiple accounts and groups per network and user
